name: Carousel Interactive Component
description:
Introduction:


This is an infinite carousel slider (loop sliding) interactive component composed of 5 slides which can be dragged infinitely. You can easily update the content and you’ll be ready to go!

There is also a simple horizontal scrolling slider where you can experience free horizontal scrolling, you can update the content of those slides too.



What will you find in this file:

  • Responsive components (infinite carousel slider, horizontal scrolling slider).
  • Stylized color all across the file.
  • Food delivery UI main screen.



How To Use This File:


You need to update the images content by replacing the images within the same frame and update the titles in the components page, and that is all you need to do.

I added the colors as styles in the file, you can change those too.


 

Creating responsive reusable components is a key for successful and speedy prototypes, especially when there is no direct way to create something, that’s why I wanted to create this component and share it with you.
